64 //
65 // Callbacks
66 //
67
68 HRESULT CaptureCallback::VideoInputFormatChanged(
69 BMDVideoInputFormatChangedEvents notification_events_raw,
70 IDeckLinkDisplayMode *new_display_mode_raw,
71 BMDDetectedVideoInputFormatFlags detected_signal_flags_raw
72 ) {
73 const auto notification_events =
74 static_cast<InputFormatChangedEvent>(notification_events_raw);
75 const DisplayMode new_display_mode(new_display_mode_raw);
76 const auto detected_signal_flags =
77 static_cast<DetectedVideoInputFormatFlags>(detected_signal_flags_raw);
78
79 if (_on_video_format_changed_cb) {
80 _on_video_format_changed_cb(
81 notification_events, new_display_mode, detected_signal_flags
82 );
83 }
84
85 const auto pixel_formats =
86 _owner->get_supported_pixel_formats(new_display_mode.get_image_format());
87 _owner->pause();
88 _owner->enable(new_display_mode.get_image_format(), pixel_formats.front());
89 _owner->flush();
90 _owner->start();
91
92 return S_OK;
93 }
94
95
96 HRESULT CaptureCallback::VideoInputFrameArrived(
97 IDeckLinkVideoInputFrame *video_frame,
98 IDeckLinkAudioInputPacket * /* unused */
99 ) {
100 // Cheat, if the frame is good we're going to reset the bad frame counter anyway
101 ++_bad_frame_counter;
102
103 if (!video_frame) {
104 _on_error_cb(VideoInputError::NullFrame);
105 return E_FAIL;
106 }
107
108 if(!video_frame->GetFlags() & bmdFrameHasNoInputSource) {
109 _on_error_cb(VideoInputError::NoInputSource);
110 return E_FAIL;
111 }
112
113 _bad_frame_counter = 0; // We know we have a good frame now
114
115 // If we don't have a callback to call we don't actually have anything to do
116 if (_on_frame_cb) {
117 VideoInputFrame frame(video_frame);
118 _on_frame_cb(frame);
119 }
120
121 return S_OK;
122 }
